content:
# The attempt to craft the electronic circuit failed due to insufficient copper plates. I currently have 0 copper plates in my inventory.
# I successfully crafted 1 iron gear wheel, which has been added to my inventory, leaving me with 3 iron plates remaining.

# To proceed, I need to smelt some copper ore to create copper plates. 
# First, I will check the inventory for any copper ore to ensure I have enough to smelt.

copper_ore_count = inspect_inventory().get(Prototype.CopperOre, 0)

if copper_ore_count > 0:
    # If I have copper ore, I will place it in the stone furnace for smelting.
    place_item(Prototype.CopperOre, position=stone_furnace_entity_info.position, quantity=copper_ore_count)
    print(f"Placed {copper_ore_count} copper ore in the stone furnace for smelting.")
else:
    print("No copper ore available for smelting. Please gather more copper ore.")

# Check the inventory after attempting to place copper ore in the furnace.
print(f"Current Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")
